snippet.title: Donut Dodo - arcade game - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#arcade #atari #nintendo #switch #retrogaming

Nintendo Switch - December 1st, 2022
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/donut-dodo-switch/

Steam - June 3rd, 2022
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1779560/Donut_Dodo/

If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo. Tough as nails, no continues and challenging for the whole family!

Donut Dodo is a light-hearted arcade game reminiscent of classics from the early 80's, such as Donkey Kong, Popeye and Burger Time. You play as Baker Billy Burns, on a quest to collect all donuts from the insatiable bird.

The game features...
- 5 single-screen levels plus a bonus stage, each with their own distinct mechanics and challenges
- incredibly tight controls (no cheap deaths) for frantic single-player arcade gameplay
- old-school 4:3 screen with a 16-color palette
- an original chiptune soundtrack by the very talented CosmicGem
- worldwide leaderboards, limited to 3-character initials, arcade style
